# AirlinePlanes

> A directory of commercial aircraft and the airlines that fly them

AirlinePlanes is a curated database of commercial aircraft with detailed specifications, history, and information about which airlines operate them.

## Quick Facts

- 45+ commercial aircraft models
- 25+ major airlines
- 4 manufacturers: Airbus, Boeing, Bombardier, Embraer

## How to Navigate

- Browse airlines: https://airlineplanes.com/airlines
- Browse aircraft: https://airlineplanes.com/aircraft
- Browse by manufacturer: https://airlineplanes.com/manufacturer
- View an aircraft: https://airlineplanes.com/aircraft/{slug}
- View an airline: https://airlineplanes.com/airlines/{slug}

## Example URLs

### Airlines
- https://airlineplanes.com/airlines/united-airlines
- https://airlineplanes.com/airlines/delta-air-lines
- https://airlineplanes.com/airlines/american-airlines

### Aircraft
- https://airlineplanes.com/aircraft/boeing-737-max-8
- https://airlineplanes.com/aircraft/airbus-a350-900
- https://airlineplanes.com/aircraft/boeing-787-9

### Manufacturers
- https://airlineplanes.com/manufacturer/boeing
- https://airlineplanes.com/manufacturer/airbus

## API

The JSON API returns aircraft and airline data including:
- Aircraft: name, manufacturer, specs (range, speed, passengers), first flight, status
- Airlines: name, IATA/ICAO codes, headquarters, fleet size, destinations

```
GET /api/aircraft - All aircraft (JSON)
GET /api/aircraft/{slug} - Single aircraft with full details
```

## Full Content

For complete aircraft and airline data including all descriptions and specifications, see:
https://airlineplanes.com/llms-full.txt

## About

AirlinePlanes researches and documents commercial aircraft with verified specifications, operational history, and current airline operators. Each aircraft includes manufacturer data and industry sources.

## Contact

Website: https://airlineplanes.com
